category.name: wcf.acp.ad
category.item: If you choose no conditions, the ad will be displayed for every user.
The requested page has to fulfill the following conditions for the ad to be displayed.
Sets the point in time at which the ad is displayed.
The active user has to fulfill the following conditions to see the ad.
Do you really want to delete the ad “{$ad->adName}”?
Sets the order in which the ads are displayed.

category.name: wcf.acp.application
category.item: The setting below is used to establish a persistent login for your website; Keep in mind to update this value whenever the domain name changes. If you are unsure which value you need to provide, you can safely copy the value of “Domain”.
Cookie domain may not contain path components
Cookie domain does not match the domain entered above (sub-domains like “www” may be omitted).
If you’re accessing this application through “http://www.example.com/community/forum/”, please enter “www.example.com”.
Domain may not contain path components
This path is already taken by application “{$conflictApplication->getName()}”
If you’re accessing this application through “http://www.example.com/community/forum/”, please enter “/community/forum/”.

category.name: wcf.acp.bbcode
category.item: Newly created BBCodes will be accessible for everyone. You can restrict usage by editing the specific user group permissions.
List of allowed children is invalid.
Content between BBCode tags will be used as attribute value unless it was explicitly specified.
Do you really want to delete the BBCode “[{$bbcode->bbcodeTag}]”?
Disables conversion of BBCodes and smilies.
Do you really want to delete the media provider “{$mediaProvider->title}”?

Provide the link format as a regular expression. One expression per line.
Examples for medium ID detection:
  • (?<ID>[0-9]+) detects a numeric ID.
  • (?<ID>[0-9a-zA-Z]+) detects an alphanumeric ID
The image must be placed inside the directory wcf/icon/ or use a FontAwesome-icon, e.g. “fa-caret-square-o-up”.

category.name: wcf.acp.cache
category.item: Do you really want to clear the cache?

category.name: wcf.acp.captcha
category.item: Enter one possible answer per line. Answers beginning and ending with “~” will be interpreted as regular expressions.
The regular expression “{$invalidRegex}” is not valid.
Do you really want to delete the question “{$question->question|language}”?

category.name: wcf.acp.cronjob
category.item: Day of the month (1 - 31), the cronjob should be executed.
Weekday (0 - 6 with Sunday = 0, or mon - sun), the cronjob should be executed.
Hours (0 - 23), the cronjob should be executed.
Minutes (0 - 59), the cronjob should be executed.
Month (1 - 12, or jan - dec), the cronjob should be executed.
Configuring cronjobs requires distinct knowledge of the crontab syntax on Unix based systems. More information about this topic can be obtained on the following web page: Newbie: Intro to cron.
Unable to find the specified class.
Do you really want to delete the cronjob “{$cronjob->description|language}”?
Do you really want to clear the cronjob log?

category.name: wcf.acp.dataImport
category.item: This data will already be imported.
You did not specify any data for importing, import has been aborted.
The selected data type is invalid.

You did not load any application through --packageID={PACKAGE_ID}. If you wish to import application-specific data, you must call this script along with the desired package id. Do you wish to continue the import? [YN]
Required if file-based data (e.g. avatars or attachments) should be imported.

An error occurred while trying to access the database:
{$exception->getMessage()}
{$exception->getErrorDesc()}
Unable to find a valid installation with the given path.
Merge users with same email address
Merge users with same username or same email address
Do you really want to delete the existing import mappings?

There are import mappings created by a previous import process, these mappings are used to properly handle connections between data from the imported forum and this one. In case you’ve imported all desired data, you can delete the mappings. It is strongly recommended to keep these mappings as long as there is still data to be imported now or in the future.
The selected data source is invalid.
There are no data importers installed.

category.name: wcf.acp.exceptionLog
category.item: No error with the ID “{$exceptionID}” was found.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Do you really want to delete the user group “{$group->groupName|language}”?
Heads up! You’re a member of this user group, changes may cause yourself being locked out from the Administration Control Panel.
Users of this group may access the Administration Control Panel based upon their granted permissions. This option must be enabled if you wish to grant access to any administrative option.
Users of this group have access to these groups, furthermore you need to specify if these users are allowed to edit these groups.
There must be at least one user group with full access, therefore it is not possible to drop these privileges.
You cannot grant user group permissions exceeding your own permissions.
The given value is too high.{if $option->maxvalue !== null} The maximum value is {#$option->maxvalue}.{/if}
The given value is too low.{if $option->minvalue !== null} The minimum value is {#$option->minvalue}.{/if}
Can access page during maintenance mode
Seconds allowed between creating two comments or replies. Use 0 to disable.
Selected BBCodes may be used by members of this group.
Can see avatars of other users
Can change their own email address
Can edit their own user title
Can send emails to other users
Can delete their own user account
All marked BBCodes may be used within the signature.
Determines the display order on the team page, user rank, and “Users Online” marking based on highest priority.
Adjust the HTML formatting for members of this group in the “Users Online” list. <strong>%s</strong> results in a bolder appearance.
There must be an occurrence of “%s”
Members can change their username after the selected days.
Can delete others’ comments on their own wall
You have entered an invalid value.
Can manage automatic user group assignments
Users need to fulfill the following conditions to be automatically added to the user group
Do you really want to delete the automatic user group assignment “{$assignment->title}”?
You have not chosen any condition.
Do you really want to copy this user group?
Permissions set for certain objects like for label groups will also be set for the new user group.
Members of the copied user group will automatically be members of the new user group.
The new user group will have the same permissions as the copied user group.

category.name: wcf.acp.index
category.item: “WoltLab®” and “Burning Board®” are registered Community Trade Marks at The Office of Harmonization for the Internal Market (OHIM) in Alicante, Spain.
The MySQL configuration option “innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit” is set to “1”, slowing down certain database queries. It is highly recommended to set its value to “2”.
You are accessing this installation from an unknown domain, possibly caused by moving to a new host. Please update the settings on Manage Applications.
For proper operation the folder “{WCF_DIR|concat:'tmp/'}” must exist and it must be writable. Please also check the permissions of the “{'WCF_DIR'|constant}” folder.
The installation will be continued within a few moments, please do not reload this page.

category.name: wcf.acp.label
category.item: Chosen CSS class name is invalid.
Do you really want to delete the label “{$label}”?
Please add a label group prior to creating labels.
Do you really want to delete the label group “{$group->groupName|language}”?
The title is visible for every user who can interact with the label group.
This optional description is visible in the Administration Control Panel only and is intended to help telling groups with the same title apart.
Display order of the label in its label group. If you leave this field empty, the label will be placed at the last position.
If you only filter the label list by a certain label group, you can sort the labels in this group using drag and drop.

category.name: wcf.acp.language
category.item: Language code is already in use by an installed language.
Please enter the ISO 639-1 language code, you can lookup the language code at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1.
Please enter the ISO 3166-1 country code, you can lookup the country code at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1.
Do you really want to delete the language “{$language->languageName}”?
Errors occurred while importing the language file:
Enter the relative path to a valid XML language file.

Enabling multilingualism provides the ability to associate user-generated content with a specific language; Newly created content is automatically associated with the user’s interface language. Users may filter content for specific languages through their settings.
You need to select at least two languages.
The selected language will be used as origin, all phrases will be copied into the new language.

category.name: wcf.acp.masterPassword
category.item: The page or action requires the master password for security reasons, the password will be remembered for your current session. In case you forgot the password, please reset it by removing the file {@$relativeWcfDir}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
Password is incorrect. In case you forgot the password, please reset it by removing the file {@$relativeWcfDir}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
Password is regarded unsafe. It should be at least 8 characters, containing upper and lower Latin letters, as well as numbers and special symbols.

The master password is the last line of defense, protecting both critical settings and sensitive data. One should choose a rather strong password which is neither known to any 3rd party person nor re-used on other web pages.

category.name: wcf.acp.notice
category.item: Choose one of the predefined appearances or select a custom appearance by providing your own CSS class name.
The entered CSS class name is invalid.
If you choose no conditions, the notice will be displayed for every user.
The requested page has to fulfill the following conditions for the notice to be displayed.
Sets the point in time at which the notice is displayed.
The active user has to fulfill the following conditions to see the notice.
Do you really want to delete the notice “{$notice->noticeName}”?
If a user dismisses a notice, it will not display for them again.
{literal}{$username}{/literal} will be replaced by the name and {literal}{$email}{/literal} by the mail address of the active user.
Dismissed notices will be displayed again.
The notice will be displayed again to users who dismissed the previous version. Guests who dismissed the notice will only see it in a new session.
Sets the order in which the notices are displayed.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: One server per line, you can additionally specify a weight factor to allow load balancing, for example “localhost:11211:67” or “10.0.13.37:31337:33”.
The server’s address, for example “localhost” or “10.0.13.37:1337”.
Caching methods different from “Filesystem” require special extensions or services running on your machine.
Memcached uses the machine’s memory to store frequently accessed data, reducing database and filesystem load. Read more about Memcached on memcached.org.
Redis uses the machine’s memory to store frequently accessed data, reducing database and filesystem load. Read more about Redis on redis.io.
Optionally provide a Proxy-Server for outgoing connections.
Changing the backend requires a rebuild of the search indices available on the page “Rebuild Data”.
Specifies how detailed the error messages are. Private completely hides the error message, reduced tries to hide sensitive information and public (only supported in debug mode) shows everything.
Should be left blank except for special circumstances.
Value should be absolute to Document Root, e.g. “/forum” for “http://www.woltlab.com/forum”.
The alias “{$urlControllerReplacementError}” equals an existing controller and cannot be used.
The alias “{$urlControllerReplacementError}” is already in use.
The controller “{$urlControllerReplacementError}” has already been aliased.
You must provide aliases using “real-name=custom-name”, the line “{$urlControllerReplacementError}” violates it.
Exceeds the maximum value{if $option->maxvalue !== null} of {#$option->maxvalue}{/if}.
Below the minimum value{if $option->minvalue !== null} of {#$option->minvalue}{/if}.
Compresses content transferred to users, reduces traffic and page load time. Does not affect files, e.g. images.
Prevents browser’s caching ensuring your users are always viewing the latest content. Increases both traffic and server load.
Sends the “X-Frame-Options” header to prevent 3rd party sites from embedding this site in a frame (sends “SAMEORIGIN”).
Library used for image processing, e.g. scaling uploaded images. “ImageMagick” is a lot faster, but is not available on every machine.
Stores IP addresses for user-created content, e.g. sessions, profiles, or forum posts.
Enter the administrator’s email address here.
The email address used by the sender for all generated emails.
The name of the sender used for all generated emails.
The signature that will be appended to every message.
This option controls the usage of “STARTTLS”. Disable it, if you are using SSL (port 465)!
The “-f” parameter sets the proper sender of the email if the PHP send method is used. This parameter may not be supported by every server. Try disabling it, if you have trouble sending emails.
Enables an additional password to protect both critical actions and sensitive data.
Enabling this validation might cause issues for users with a rotating IP address.

Users can login from multiple devices (PC, tablet, smartphone, etc) concurrently, all devices will share the same session. Disabling this will restrict users to only one device (session) at a time, causing all other device sessions to terminate. It is not recommended to disable this option.
Show current time in page footer
The default timezone of your page.
Inactive users will not appear in “Users Online” after the selected seconds.
Disables all applications and prevents access from unprivileged users.
The notice that is displayed to visitors while maintenance mode is enabled.
Enables you to use HTML in “Maintenance Notice”.
Show version number in copyright notice
Enables extensive error messages. Should always be disabled in production environments!
Append the attribute “rel="nofollow"” to all external links
The attribute “rel="nofollow"” tells search engines to disregard external links.
Open external links in a new window
Appends the attribute “target="_blank"” to external links, causing the user’s browser to open the link in a new window.
It is strongly recommended to disable this option in production environments.
Your authentication code is available in the customers area on woltlab.com.
Displays the current WoltLab news on the administration control panel’s start page.
You can request your own API-Key for using reCAPTCHA on the reCAPTCHA website.
Changes storage location for attachments. Heads up! You are responsible to move already existing attachments to the new location.

One word per Line. Using at least one of these words within a message causes an immediate rejection.
Use “*” to match parts: “wolt*” matches “woltlab”
Use “~” to find splitted parts: “wolt~” matches “wolt-lab”
Enables censorship for all messages containing the words below.
Stores older versions of user-created content.
Content in the edit history will be removed after the selected days. Use 0 to disable.
You can obtain both your Client ID and Client Secret at GitHub. The Callback URL is: {link controller="GithubAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain both your API key and API secret at Twitter. The Callback URL is: {link controller="TwitterAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain your APP-ID and Application Secret at Facebook. The OAuth redirect URI is: {link controller="FacebookAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain your Client ID and Client Secret at Google. The Redirect-URI is: {link controller="GoogleAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
Enables support for Gravatars (“Global Recognized Avatar”).
Password complexity will be validated, unsafe passwords will be rejected.
List of unavailable names for registration, one name per line.
List of unavailable email addresses for registration, one address per line.
List of valid email addresses for registration, one address per line.
Specifying a value requires the user to provide a birthday during registration.
Disables registration for all users, new users may be created through an administrator.
Disclaimer must be explicitly accepted during registration.
Maximum Height of Images in Signatures
List of unavailable user titles for members, one title per line.
Previous usernames will be displayed for the selected days.
You can sort the members list by one of the following options.
The default sort order for the members list.
You can sort the “Users Online” list by one of the following options.
The default sort order for the “Users Online” list.
“Users Online” will be refreshed in the selected seconds. Use 0 to disable.
Exclude guests from the most-online record
Notifications will be removed after the selected days.
Recent Activities will be removed after the selected days.
Profile Visitors will be removed after the selected days.
Users can like their own content
Enables the use of tags for content.
You can sort the search results by one of the following options.
The default sort order for the search results.
You have entered an invalid value.
The entered code will be appended to the page footer of your site. You can use it to embed services like “Google Analytics” or “Piwik”.

You may replace parts of the title within the URL. You could use it to replace special characters or to expand abbreviations. (One replacement per line)
Examples:
WBB=WoltLab Burning Board
GmbH=Gesellschaft mit beschränkter Haftung

You can rename controllers by assigning an alias to them, please provide only one alias per line. Aliases must be defined as “real-name=custom-name” and contain only lower-case a-z, the numbers 0-9 and the dash for compatibility reasons. Examples:
  • “board-list=forums”, the link “http://example.com/index.php?board-list/” will turn into “http://example.com/index.php?forums/”
  • “members-list=profiles”, the link “http://example.com/index.php?members-list/” will turn into “http://example.com/index.php?profiles/”
You can move the map by keeping the left button of your mouse pressed.
When entering a location, the current location of the user is used as start point on the map.
Inform users regarding the use of their personal data.
Displays a notice on cookie usage according to EU Directive 2009/136/EG upon first visit.

Rewrites URLs into a better readable representation, turning links like “http://example.com/index.php?thread/1-hello-i-am-john-doe/” into “http://example.com/thread/1-hello-i-am-john-doe/” and similar. Heads up! This option requires a rewrite module installed on your webserver and an appropriate configuration; It will not work without any prior configuration applied by you!
Please read the following article for instructions: Setting up user friendly URLs

Enabling this option forces the system to use WoltLab Community Framework 2.0-compilant URLs and should only be used to ensure compatibility with legacy URLs:
  • WCF 2.0: “index.php/Thread/123-Title/”
  • WCF 2.1+: “index.php?thread/123-title/”
Enable Captcha protection for “Send Email to User”
Failed login attempts are not considered after the selected seconds.
Failed login attempts allowed from the same IP address until the user is forced to solve a captcha.
Failed login attempts allowed from the same IP address until the IP address is temporarily blocked from logging in.
Failed login attempts allowed from the same user account until a captcha is enforced, regardless of the IP address.
Failed login attempt logs will be removed after the selected days. Raising the limit will provide a longer history, but at the expense of increased database storage usage.

A secret key that serves the purpose of validating data to prevent tampering. Keep this key secret! A random key was generated for you during installation, you don't need to change it. Note: This key must be at least 15 characters long.
The default Gravatar type used if no matching Gravatar was found.
Shows recommended products from the WoltLab® Plugin-Store on the Administration Control Panel’s start page.
Receiving payments requires a PayPal business account with enabled “Instant Payment Notification” (IPN).
Enables the management for paid subscriptions.
Users are required to accept your Terms of Service prior to any purchase

category.name: wcf.acp.package
category.item: Applications cannot be installed via CLI.
There is already an application installed which has the same abbreviation.
The tables above already exist and will be replaced during the installation. Any contained data will be lost.
The tables above already exist and will be removed during the installation. Any contained data will be lost.
The selected package does not support an installation.
Package “{$package->packageName|language}” cannot be updated using the selected archive.
Do you really want to install the package “{@$package->getName()}”?
This package can’t be installed because of the following already installed packages:
The following, already installed packages prohibit installing this package:
Unable to resolve requirements of this package.
The uploaded file is a package containg a style.
Unable to install, some or all required packages are not installed.
Target directory already contains an application.
Searches for a specific identifier, e.g. “com.woltlab.wcf”.
Your system is up to date, there are no updates available.
Provide the direct path to the desired resource, it may be either an URL or a local filesystem path.
Upload package archive from your local machine.
Do you really want to uninstall the package “{@$package->getName()}”?
The package list could not be retrieved
Your credentials are invalid, please verify {if $updateServer->requiresLicense()}license and serial number{else}username and password{/if}.

{if $updateServer->requiresLicense()}License and serial number{else}Username and password{/if} have been accepted by the server, but they do not grant you the permission to download this commercial product.
You are not allowed to access this package.
The following packages are not compatible with the packages you are trying to install.

“{$excludedPackage[existingPackageName]}” in version “{$excludedPackage[existingPackageVersion]}” prevents {if $excludedPackage[action] == 'update'}an update{else}the installation{/if} of “{$excludedPackage[packageName]}” {if $excludedPackage[action] == 'update'}to{else}in{/if} version “{$excludedPackage[packageVersion]}”
The following packages to be installed are not compatible with the currently installed packages.
“{$excludedPackage[packageName]}” in version “{$excludedPackage[packageVersion]}” cannot be installed because it is incompatible with the installed package “{$excludedPackage[existingPackageName]}”
The following optional packages are available for installation:
Uploading of specified file has failed.
The file “{$archive}”{if !$targetArchive|empty} within the archive “{$targetArchive}”{/if} is missing.
The package “{$archive}” is missing the required “package.xml“ file.
The package name “{$packageName}” does not met the expectations and was rejected.
The package version “{$packageVersion}” does not met the expectations and was rejected.
The package “{lang}{$packageName}{/lang}” does not contain valid install instructions.
The package “{lang}{$packageName}{/lang}” (installed version: “{$packageVersion}”) should be updated to version “{$deliveredPackageVersion}”, but an update is not supported.

The following installed packages exclude the current package due to known incompatibilities:
    {foreach from=$packages item=package}
  • “{$package}” ({$package->package})
    • {/foreach}

This package is incompatible with the following installed packages:
    {foreach from=$packages item=package}
  • “{$package}” ({$package->package})
    • {/foreach}
The installation requires the package “{$packageName}” in version “{$packageVersion}“ or higher, but only version “{$deliveredPackageVersion}“ is shipped.

Requires the package {if $package === null}“{$packageName}”{else}“{$package}”{/if} in version “{$packageVersion}” or higher, {if $package === null}but it is neither installed nor shipped.{else}but only version “{$package->packageVersion}” is installed.{/if}

The {if $type == 'install'}install{else}update{/if}-instructions specify the file “{$value}” for the Package Installation Plugin “{$pip}”, but it cannot be found in the specified location. Possible causes:
  • The file has not been added to the archive at all
  • The file exists but under a (slightly) different name (typo)
The package cannot be installed, please review the validation results below.

category.name: wcf.acp.paidSubscription
category.item: Buyers will be automatically added to the chosen user groups.
You have entered an invalid length. You may set a maximum of 90 for “Day(s)”, 24 for “Month(s)” or 5 for “Year(s)”.
Sets the display order for paid subscriptions.
Disabling a subscription will make it unpurchasable.
Periodic payments per time period will keep the subscription active.
Prevents purchasing of other subscriptions for buyers of this subscription.
Do you really want to terminate the subscription “{$subscriptionUser->title|language}” for the user “{$subscriptionUser->username}”?
Adding subscriptions requires at least one active payment provider for the option “Supported Payment Methods”.
Do you really want to delete the paid subscription “{$subscription->title|language}”?

category.name: wcf.acp.pluginStore
category.item: Error {@$status}: The server was unable to process your request.

Querying the Plugin-Store to fetch the purchased products requires a secure connection.

Your PHP version has been compiled without OpenSSL support required to establish secure connections, please contact your hosting company or system-administrator to resolve this shortcoming.
Please enter your WoltLab.com username and password.
Your provided credentials are invalid, please check your username and password!
Save credentials for this session only
The search returned no results, either because you have not purchased any products yet or your purchases are not compatible with this version.
You already have the most recent version installed
Do you really want to install the product “{$product[packageName]}”?
The Update-Server for “{$wcfMajorRelease}” (“http://store.woltlab.com/{$wcfMajorRelease}/”) is disabled and cannot be used for new installs or updates.

The Update-Server for “{$wcfMajorRelease}” does not exist in your installation. If you wish to install the packages below, you must add it.
The server address is: “http://store.woltlab.com/{$wcfMajorRelease}/”
The Update-Server for “{$wcfMajorRelease}” has not been queried yet, please search for updates to fetch the package list.

category.name: wcf.acp.rebuildData
category.item: In order to ensure consistency, e.g. after a data import, it is highly recommended to perform all the actions below in their respective order, starting from top to bottom.
Rebuilds the user counters and ranks.
Rebuilds the users using the Likes System.

category.name: wcf.acp.rescueMode
category.item: Please adjust both domain and path for each application listed below to match the changed settings. The domain must be provided without an explicit protocol such as “http://” or “https://”.
Changes to the configuration require valid credentials of an administrator with the permissions to manage installed applications.

The configured domains and/or paths do not match the address used to access this page. This can happen when moving to a new domain or changing the directory structure. Please use the form below to provide the new values.
This user is not authorized to manage installed applications.

category.item: There is no data available for the set period.

At least one alternative smiley code is already in use by an other smiley
Unable to find a file on given path
Upload the image file for the smiley.
The uploaded file is no image file.

category.name: wcf.acp.style
category.item: Content will be appended to the style sheet and may contain pure CSS. Furthermore you can use SCSS including all Mixins provided by Community Framework.

Allows you to override SCSS variables not available through the style editor itself. Syntax: “$variableName: variableValue;”, referred variables must be declared prior any attempt to read their value.
Provided value was invalid, please verify these items:
Variable “{$error[text]}” is already defined by the style editor
Do you really want to duplicate the style “{$style->styleName}”?
Do you really want to delete the style “{$style->styleName}”?
Choose if you want to export the style “{$style->styleName}” as a package. Packages can be installed through the package management or uploaded to the WoltLab® Plugin-Store.
Select components included in the export for the style “{$style->styleName}”.
Upload a preview image for this style, acceptable image types are JPG and PNG. Dimensions should be 102px × 64px, exceeding images will be scaled.
Path for optional images for your style, directory should be located within “images”.
Upload a style from your local machine.
Unable to import the selected style, uploaded file is not a valid style.

Enter a package identifier matching the pattern “tld.domain.packageName”. For example if you own the domain “example.com” and created a style called “Blue Sunrise”, you could pick “com.example.style.blueSunrise” as a valid and descriptive identifier.
This style is protected and editing is limited; You can disable this protection.

Imported and installed styles are automatically protected to prevent editing the original declaration, preserving the ability to update this style. You may disable this protection and recover full editing permissions, but it can no longer be updated.

It is neither recommended nor necessary to remove the protection in most cases, styles can still be fully customized while preserving the preset declarations.

Please save any unsaved changes before proceeding.
You have provided an invalid path.
You have provided an invalid version number.
You have provided an invalid date.
The filename of the page logo image.

Select one of the tags. The other tags will be set as synonyms of the selected tag.

This name is already taken by a different template

category.item: Assigning the following users to user groups selected below

The user will be automatically unbanned at the entered point in time.

Export email addresses from the following users
Find users which are not part of the selected user groups.

What happened?

An error has occured while trying to handle your request and execution has been terminated. Please forward the above error code to the site administrator.

 

The error code can be used by an administrator to lookup the full error message in the Administration Control Panel via “Logs » Errors”. In addition the error has been written to the log file located at {$logFile} and can be accessed with a FTP program or similar.

 

Notice: The error code was randomly generated and has no use beyond looking up the full message.

category.item:

Your account is awaiting approval from an administrator.

Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
Your registration is now completed.
Your user account is not activated yet. You must complete the activation process first.

Limitation of liability for internal content

The content of our website has been compiled with meticulous care and to the best of our knowledge. However, we cannot assume any liability for the up-to-dateness, completeness or accuracy of any of the pages.

Pursuant to section 7, para. 1 of the TMG (Telemediengesetz – Tele Media Act by German law), we as service providers are liable for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. However, pursuant to sections 8 to 10 of the TMG, we as service providers are not under obligation to monitor external information provided or stored on our website. Once we have become aware of a specific infringement of the law, we will immediately remove the content in question. Any liability concerning this matter can only be assumed from the point in time at which the infringement becomes known to us.

Limitation of liability for external links

Our website contains links to the websites of third parties (“external links”). As the content of these websites is not under our control, we cannot assume any liability for such external content. In all cases, the provider of information of the linked websites is liable for the content and accuracy of the information provided. At the point in time when the links were placed, no infringements of the law were recognisable to us. As soon as an infringement of the law becomes known to us, we will immediately remove the link in question.

Copyright

The content and works published on this website are governed by the copyright laws of Germany. Any duplication, processing, distribution or any form of utilisation beyond the scope of copyright law shall require the prior written consent of the author or authors in question.

Data protection

A visit to our website can result in the storage on our server of information about the access (date, time, page accessed). This does not represent any analysis of personal data (e.g., name, address or e-mail address). If personal data are collected, this only occurs – to the extent possible – with the prior consent of the user of the website. Any forwarding of the data to third parties without the express consent of the user shall not take place.

We would like to expressly point out that the transmission of data via the Internet (e.g., by e-mail) can offer security vulnerabilities. It is therefore impossible to safeguard the data completely against access by third parties. We cannot assume any liability for damages arising as a result of such security vulnerabilities.

The use by third parties of all published contact details for the purpose of advertising is expressly excluded. We reserve the right to take legal steps in the case of the unsolicited sending of advertising information; e.g., by means of spam mail.

Source: Mustervorlage.net

Your user account has been connected with Twitter.
Your Twitter account is already connected to a different user.
Your account is no longer connected with Twitter.

You’re creating an account through  Facebook.

Your account is no longer connected with Facebook.

category.name: wcf.user.avatar
category.item: The administrators {if $__wcf->user->avatarID || $__wcf->user->enableGravatar}have banned your avatar and {/if}disallowed you from using an avatar{if $__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}: {$__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}{/if}.
The scaled versions of your avatar are based on a square cutout. You may specify an individual cutout by holding down your mouse button and moving the highlighted area to the desired position.

You may use the following file extensions “{"\n"|str_replace:', ':$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.allowedFileExtensions')}” for your avatar with a maximum file size of {@$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.maxSize')|filesize}. The minimum dimensions are 96×96 pixel, it is recommended to provide a dimension of {@MAX_AVATAR_WIDTH}×{@MAX_AVATAR_HEIGHT} pixel. Any avatar that exceeds this limit will be scaled down if possible.
Gravatar (Global Recognized Avatar) provides a globally reusable avatar connected with your email address “{$__wcf->user->email}”. Visit www.gravatar.com to set up or change your avatar.
Your email address is not connected with a gravatar.
Your currently used avatar will be deleted.
Image does not match the allowed file extensions.
Image dimensions are below the minimum sizes.

category.name: wcf.user.condition
category.item: Users have to be a member of all selected user groups.
You may not simultaneously select “Uses mobile browser“ and “Uses no mobile browser“.
Users may not be a member of any selected user group.
The selected user groups in “in User Groups“ and “not in User Groups“ are conflicting.
You may not simultaneously select “Banned“ and “Not Banned“.
You may not simultaneously select “Approved“ and “Awaiting Approval“.

category.item: if (data.returnValues.count == 0) { "No Notifications" } else if (data.returnValues.count == 1) { "1 Notification" } else { data.returnValues.count + " Notifications" }
